Name: Trials of Wilderness
About the game: You are alone on an island, trying desperately to survive amongst the village tribes of savages. To do this you need food, water, and shelter. Hunt animals to gather meat. Chop down trees to build a base. Gather resources (stone, iron, sulfur, clay, coal, leather...). Plant crops, water the planters with a pump and pipes or bucket. Trap and tame wolves and bears to protect you from enemies. Tame and breed other animals for food or sell them to buy rare items. Make weapons, armors and potions. Raid villages or sneak inside to take loot. Place traps and defend your base from savages and monsters. Explore unknown places where enemies are hiding. Sell or buy items in the shop. Fight with big creatures. However take a few moments to enjoy the beauty of the wilderness, but don't be to relaxed. Other game features: Peaceful mode where savages and monsters do not attack you, normal survival mode, and a base defense mode where savages attacks more frequently. Difficulty customization (Enemies spawning, player health, Resources count, start items). Realistic view and hearing for animals, savages, monsters... Realistic taming and feeding of the animals. Most of gameplay videos is with outdated graphics. The game will continue to receive updates after the full release. After the discount, the price in the rubles will be 350, and several more currencies will be changed.
